original_text: In all the places that you live, soldiers will destroy your towns. They will also destroy the places where you worship false gods. They will break down the altars so that they become heaps of stones. They will break your idols into pieces. They will destroy the altars where you burn incense. They will remove all those things that you have made.
korean_text: 내가 너희가 거주하는 모든 성읍이 사막이 되게 하며 산당을 황폐하게 하리니 이는 너희 제단이 깨어지고 황폐하며 너희 우상들이 깨어져 없어지며 너희 분향제단들이 찍히며 너희가 만든 것이 폐하여지며

sentences.original_text: In all the places that you live
They will also destroy the places
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 그 장소들을 파괴할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will break down the altars
so that they become heaps of stones
They will break your idols into pieces
They will remove all those things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 모든 것들을 제거할 것이다
